title: Learn Chinese HSK 1 Chinesimple

creator: Chinesimple
descriptionHtml:
Don’t worry! We know that learning Chinese is rather complicated, but our student Bingo has just obtained his HSK Certificate, thanks to Chinesimple, and he is ready to help you.

Stop wasting your time with boring books, highly expensive courses or heavy paper dictionaries. With no more than Bingo's assistance you are going to read, write and speak Chinese. Bingo is going to undertake your progress evaluation by analyzing your hit rate and failures. This way you may practice and concentrate only on the essential. In a very short time and with a minimum amount of effort you will be ready for the official HSK exam, without the constraints of schedules or costly resources. All necessary contents are available at Chinesimple, always updated.

This is what you are going to learn:
● You are going to learn more than 2500 words.
● You are going to learn to express yourself with more than 1800 common sentences and expressions.
● You are going to learn how to read and write texts.
● You are going to learn the required grammar with more than 200 lessons.
● You are going to enjoy 2500 Picturecards / Flashcards with an image and the meaning of each word.
● You are going to practice with more than 20 completely different games.
● You are going to practice with real pronouncing and writing exercises.
● You are going to evaluate your pronouncing with voice recognition.
● You will be able to learn both simplified and traditional characters.
● You are going to evaluate yourself with different evaluation tests in order to know your level.
● You are going to have example sentences for each learned word.
● You will be able to save your favorite words in customized lists.
● You will be able to set as you wish the color of the pitches, the Pinyin mode and even the type of character.
● You will be provided with progress statistics.
● You will instantly know which words you should pay more attention to.
● You will reach your goal once you have completed our more than 6000 challenges and achievements.
● You will be able to enjoy all the audio recorded by a native Chinese teacher.
● You will have access to the contents wherever you are, without the need of internet connection.
● All the contents are available in your own language, translated by professional translators (English, French, German, Italian, Russian and Spanish).
● The Chinese version which you are going to study is the most widespread and official one – Mandarin.

Stop looking and start straight away learning Chinese for free. Start speaking and writing Chinese in a fast and funny way. With Chinesimple you will save money and time and simultaneously you are going to help our environment by reducing the use of paper, ink and plastic. At Chinesimple you will be 100% digital and environmentally friendly.

Bingo is waiting for you!

Other users who are already learning with Chinesimple:
● More than 1,000,000 total downloads.
● +165,000 active users.
● +7,000 total reviews.
● Average rating: 4.8 / 5.
● Apps available on iOS / Android platforms.
● Since 2012 Chinesimple has been helping other people to learn Chinese.
descriptionShort: Learn Chinese fast and for free and pass the official HSK examination.

• Minor fixes and improvements to HSK Tests.
• A few content and translation fixes, many thanks to the users who wrote us.

title:

9.9.99

creator: Khanji School
descriptionHtml:
Quickly Master Chinese with Chinesimple HSK – Your Path to HSK Certification

Learning Chinese can be challenging, but with Chinesimple HSK and our expert tutor Bingo, you can achieve your HSK certificate with ease.

The All-in-One App That Combines the Best of Every Chinese Learning Tool

• 📘 Vast Vocabulary: Access 5000+ words for HSK v2 and 11000+ words for HSK v3, covering all essential vocabulary. Think of it as a comprehensive Chinese dictionary and a strong alternative to Pleco.
• 📝 Enhanced Reading & Writing: Develop your skills with detailed Chinese lessons and practical exercises in Chinese grammar and vocabulary. You'll also improve your ability to read Chinese, similar to the experience offered by Du Chinese.
• 🖌️ Animated Stroke Guidance: Master stroke order and direction with 4000+ engaging animations, similar to Skritter’s approach, perfect for learning Hanzi.
• 🗣️ Real-Time Pronunciation: Improve your Chinese speaking skills with voice recognition technology, essential for mastering Chinese pronunciation and Pinyin.
• 🌏 Complete Character Mastery: Learn Chinese characters—both simplified and traditional—for mainland China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, and Macau, ensuring you excel in any region. This includes Hanzi learning for proficiency.
• 🃏 Comprehensive Flashcards: Access a flashcard for every HSK word, with an image for each one. While they may not be as beautifully illustrated as those in Chineasy, we offer over 6000 flashcards with images, ensuring you have all the tools you need to master the vocabulary.
• 📈 Track Your Progress: Monitor your improvement with comprehensive tests and assessments, preparing you for HSK tests and Chinese exams. Compete with other learners using apps like Super Chinese.
• 📖 See Words in Action: Learn word usage through engaging example sentences, akin to the methods used by Hello Chinese. Strengthen your Chinese skill with practical applications.
• 🔊 Authentic Audio: Listen to native speakers for perfect pronunciation, essential for mastering Chinese pinyin and improving Chinese hanzi understanding.
• 🈯️ Mandarin Fluency: Achieve fluency in the world's most spoken native language with tools designed for Mandarin learning. Perfect for those who want to learn Mandarin free or through Chinese courses and online Chinese classes.

Eco-Friendly Learning

Save time and money while helping the environment. Chinesimple is 100% digital, reducing the need for paper, ink, and plastic. ♻️

Become Part of Our Learning Community
• 🌍 Over 2,000,000 downloads worldwide.
• 👥 Engaged community of over 300,000 learners.
• 📱 Trusted by users on both iOS and Android platforms since 2012.
• Start Learning Chinese for Free Today

Download Chinesimple HSK now and start your journey to mastering Chinese. Bingo is here to guide you every step of the way!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
